Title: Draw Along With Blue
Plot: Blue and Steve have been having fun drawing and we're invited to grab a pencil and a paper and draw along. We get to draw all sorts of neat things and meet Markie the Marker, who has us play a game in which he try to figure out who he's drawing. We look outside the window for something neat to draw and then share our drawing with Steve and he shares his with us. Later, we skiddoo into Chalk World, where Chalk-Girl asks for Steve's help in telling the story of him trying to find the third clue.
GuestStars: Savannah L. Andre, P.J. Battisti, Robert P. Charde, Christina Franklin, Jordan Mancuse, Sean McKeegan, Nicole Deanne Monroe, Makalla Zimick, Jake Zindulka
